column2: an A.M. Eatery////Snooze is a great place for brunch...if you're willing to wait. Don't come here if you're already hungry; it's a guaranteed recipe for hangriness because the wait is usually at least 30 minutes - likely more. The only way to avoid the wait is come super early in the morning (weekends are the worst
column3: but weekdays are still pretty busy)
column5: you'd prefer to sleep and eat your brunch at
